Package maldiniPaone.servlets.managers

Class ReportManager

java.lang.Object
maldiniPaone.servlets.managers.ReportManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
ManageAssignment, ManageReportCreation
public class ReportManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements ManageReportCreation, ManageAssignment
Implements ManageReportCreation and ManageAssignment. Singleton design pattern

    • addReport

      public boolean addReport​(java.lang.String username, Location location, java.util.List<Photo> photos, java.lang.String licensePlate, java.lang.String note) throws ServerSideDatabaseException, IllegalParameterException, java.io.IOException
      Description copied from interface: ManageReportCreation
      Adds a new Report to the System.
      Specified by:
      addReport in interface ManageReportCreation
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the citizen making the report
      location - the location where the violation being reported happened
      photos - the list of photos associated with the report
      licensePlate - String containing the license plate of the car
      note - additional notes provided by the user
      Returns:
      true if the creation is successful , false otherwise
      Throws:
      ServerSideDatabaseException - if the database can't be found
      IllegalParameterException - if the provided parameters are invalid
      java.io.IOException - if the photos couldn't be saved

      IllegalParameterException - when provided parameters aren't valid

      Description copied from interface: ManageAssignment
      Allows a User to terminate an assignment
      Specified by:
      terminateAssignment in interface ManageAssignment
      Parameters:

      username - the username of user who terminates the assignment
